[
    Block(
        Braced {
            left_brace: Span(
                1,
                7,
            ),
            inner: [
                Expression(
                    SemicolonTerminated {
                        inner: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        9,
                                    ),
                                    name: "a",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                        semicolon: Span(
                            1,
                            11,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ],
            right_brace: Span(
                1,
                13,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
